long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Speed through your browsing experience with our Sonic the Hedgehog-themed live wallpaper extension!

🎨 Minimalist Design: A vibrant, energetic interface inspired by Sonic’s iconic style and high-speed adventures.
⏰ Clock and Date: Stay updated with a sleek display that mirrors Sonic’s fast-paced world.
🔗 Quick Access Shortcuts: Navigate effortlessly to your favorite websites.
🎮 Play Games: Dive into Sonic-inspired games directly from your shortcut panel.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Perform fast and efficient searches with your preferred engine.
🚀 More Extensions: Amplify your browsing experience with features as dynamic as Sonic himself.
